message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 no such table: wp_zestatix_url_tracking.
details:
[13-May-2025 09:02:34 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

SELECT DISTINCT wp_zestatix_url_tracking.id FROM wp_zestatix_url_tracking INNER JOIN wp_zestatix_element ON wp_zestatix_url_tracking.id = wp_zestatix_element.id WHERE tracked = 1 AND ( ( url = 'http://127.0.0.1:9401/' AND subdir = 1 ) OR ( url = 'example.com:443' ) OR ( subdir = 1 AND 'example.com:443' REGEXP CONCAT( '^', url ) ) )
